item.title: Dark Age 2 - One Page Template
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

This is built with Bootstrap.

Image preview:

Code:

<!DOCTYPE html>

<html>

	<head>
		<title>Dark Age 2.0 - Home</title>
		<link href="css/bootstrap.css" rel="stylesheet" media="screen" />
		<link href="css/style.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
		<link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Kaushan+Script' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>
		<script>
			!function ($) {
				$(function(){
					$('#slideshow').carousel()
				})
			}(window.jQuery)
		</script>
	</head>

	<body>
		<div id="nav-wrapper">

		</div>

								</div>
							</div>
						</div>

			</div>
		</div>
		<div id="wrapper">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="span4">
					<div class="header">Box Header</div>
